Package com.github.siroshun09.messages.minimessage.base

Interface TagResolverBase

All Superinterfaces:
Function<MiniMessageSource,TagResolver>
public interface TagResolverBase extends Function<MiniMessageSource,TagResolver>
An interface to create the TagResolver from the MiniMessageSource.
